typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Empno as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Location as string,
		Job as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Empno as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Location as string,
		Job as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Empno'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Empno,
		EmpName,
		Location,
		Job
	)) ~> sink1
